parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: TcpConnectionType
parameters.description:
The availability check method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **SHORT**: Alibaba Cloud uses short-lived connections to check the availability of the instance.
*   **LONG**: Alibaba Cloud uses persistent connections to check the availability of the instance.
